Our Services

Comprehensive Facade Solutions

From design to delivery, we provide a complete range of architectural glazing and cladding services built on engineering precision and certified quality.

Structural Glazing

High-performance structural silicone glazing systems designed for superior weather resistance, thermal insulation, and long-term durability.

Curtain Wall Systems

Precision-engineered unitized and stick curtain wall systems that combine aesthetic elegance with structural integrity.

Spider Glazing

Frameless point-supported glass facades using stainless steel spider fittings, creating seamless transparency and modern aesthetics.

ACP Cladding

Aluminium composite panel cladding solutions with fire-rated materials and precision installation in a wide range of finishes.

Skylights & Canopies

Engineered skylight systems and glass canopies that bring natural light into interiors while maintaining waterproofing and safety.

Custom Facade Engineering

Bespoke facade solutions tailored to complex architectural designs including challenging geometries and curved glass.

Expanded Services

Delivery Models That Fit Your Project

Choose a collaboration model that aligns with your design phase, budget, and timeline. We support everything from engineering-only scopes to turnkey facade delivery.

Design + Build

Single-point responsibility across design, procurement, fabrication, and installation for simplified delivery.

Engineering Support

Facade engineering, calculations, detailing, and value engineering for architect-led projects.

Retrofit & Upgrades

Modernization and performance upgrades for existing facades with minimal disruption to operations.

Materials & Standards

All systems use certified glass, aluminum, sealants, and fasteners verified for weather, fire, and structural performance.

IS/EN/ASTM compliantWind & water testedFire-rated optionsThermal optimized
Our Process

A Systematic Approach to Excellence

Our structured workflow ensures every project is delivered with precision, safety, and full accountability from start to finish.

1

Consultation

Understanding your vision, requirements, and project scope.

2

Design & Engineering

Technical drawings, structural calculations, and material specification.

3

Validation

Peer review, load testing simulation, and regulatory compliance check.

4

Fabrication

Precision manufacturing with certified materials in our facility.

5

Quality Audit

Pre-dispatch quality audit and safety verification of all components.

6

Installation

Expert on-site installation by trained, safety-certified teams.

7

Handover

Final inspection, documentation, and ongoing maintenance support.
